import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import {AccountService} from '../_services/account.service'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import {User} from '../_models/user'; import {Router} from '@angular/router'; import {ToastrService} from 'ngx-toastr'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nav', templateUrl: './nav.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav.component.css'] }) export class NavComponent implements OnInit { constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } }
